name: Robots of Rage - Ad Free
description:
An old rouge AWE unit has started corrupting the towers which controls all the working robots and they have started attacking people. As long as the local tower is not corrupted the problem is manageable.

You, are a recently outdated Pawl unit and you saw first hand what the AWE unit has done and based on predetermined logic and calculations, it was decided that you have to stop it. Fight your way to stop the AWE unit before it reaches the communications tower and corrupts all the Robots in the area.

Robots of Rage was inspired by arcade classics like Double Dragon©, Streets of Rage©, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles© The Arcade Game but designed specifically for use with mobile devices. Instead of a classic trackball, Robots of Rageuses a unique touch-and-punch controls replicating the genuine arcade experience on your phone or tablet.

Robots of Rage is absolutely free for everyone. Enjoy!

Any questions or concerns? Email us: kimun8tytech@gmail.com
